Logfile.py - logfile parsing¶

Author:Andreas Heger
Release:$Id$
Date:April 02, 2014
Tags:Python

Purpose¶

Parse logfiles

Usage¶

Example:

python cgat_script_template.py --help

Type:

python cgat_script_template.py --help

for command line help.
